Estee Lauder Nutritious Airy Lotion

Brand: Estée Lauder

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER\AQUA\EAU, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, PROPANEDIOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL DICAPRYLATE/DICAPRATE, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 METHYLGLUCOSE DISTEARATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, LACTOBACILLUS FERMENT, PORPHYRIDIUM CRUENTUM EXTRACT, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, PHENOXYETHANOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL

Directions: • Apply AM & PM all over face
